text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Kohalpur City |other_name = |native_name = |nickname = |settlement_type = Municipality |motto = |image_skyline = |image_caption = |image_flag = |image_seal = |image_map = |mapsize = 300px |map_caption = |pushpin_map = Nepal |pushpin_label_position = bottom |pushpin_mapsize = 300 |pushpin_map_caption = Location in Nepal |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = |subdivision_type1 = Zone |subdivision_name1 = Bheri Zone |subdivision_type2 = District |subdivision_name2 = Banke District | |government_footnotes = |government_type = City |leader_title = |leader_name = |leader_title1 = |leader_name1 = |established_title = |established_date = |unit_pref = |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = 685 | population_as_of = 2015 | population_footnotes = | population_note = | population_total = 35546 | population_density_km2 = auto |timezone = NST |utc_offset = +5:45 |timezone_DST = |utc_offset_DST = |coordinates = |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = |postal_code_type = Postal code |postal_code = 21904 |area_code = 081 |blank_name = |blank_info = |website = www.kohalpurmun.gov.np |footnotes = }} Kohalpur () is a municipality of Banke District of Bheri Zone which is located on Mid-Western Development Region of Nepal. Kohalpur municipality was established on 18 May 2014 by merging the two VDC called Kohalpur & Rajhena. The city of Nepalgunj is to the south of the region, and Ghorahi is to the west. It is six kilometres from the Indian border. It is one of the most developing city of Nepal. It is the centerpoint of roadway transport to East, West , North & South. It is listed on the Province 5 of Nepal. ==References== Category:Cities in Nepal Category:Municipalities of Nepal
title: Kohalpur
